alert.note: Alert for Barton; Jasper; Vernon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 2:18AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Cherokee, southern Crawford, Barton, southeastern Vernon and northern Jasper Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 218 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near West Mineral, or 11 miles north of Columbus, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pittsburg... Prairie State Park... Lamar... Frontenac... Columbus... Girard... Arma... Jasper... Golden City... Liberal... Cherokee... Weir... Alba... Sheldon... Sherman... Mulberry... Scammon... Purcell... Chicopee... Mccune... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 50 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for southeastern Kansas...and southwestern and west central Missouri.
